segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit its identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and, when required, the time of the creation of the message and optionally to specify other process dates which apply to the whole message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references which apply to the whole message and optionally to specify related dates.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference for the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify the parties associated with the message.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the reporting party and in addition to identify the customer when the reporting party is a third party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number for the party.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the party.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to identify a referenced credit advice message together with any associated transaction details.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the reference number of the referenced credit advice message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify any dates relating to the referenced credit advice message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify the nature of transactions associated with the referenced credit advice, together with any associated amounts and geographical details.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to specify the nature of a transaction.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify additional free text information relating to the nature of the transaction.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify an amount and associated currency for the transaction such as the debit flow amount or the credit flow amount.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a country involved in the transaction such as country of origin or country of destination.

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify total values for control purposes such as total value of credit items.
